NF.Q: Which years did the total Stadium Attendance fall between 319608.13 and 353251.09 tickets/session? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
